registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744;</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><table style="font-size:1px;width:100%"><tbody><tr><td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 2px solid;"/></tr><tr><td style="height:15px"><td>&#160;</td></tr></tbody></table><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong><span style="text-decoration:underline">ITEM 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition</span></strong></p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">On February 6, 2024, Linde plc issued a press release setting forth Linde plc&#8217;s results of operations for the quarter and year ended December 31, 2023. A copy of Linde plc&#8217;s press release is furnished herewith as Exhibit 99.1 and is hereby incorporated by reference in this Item 2.02.</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>ITEM 9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits.</strong></p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px;text-indent:0.5in">(d) Exhibits. The following exhibit is furnished herewith pursuant to Item 2.02 hereof:</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><table style="border-spacing:0;font-size:10pt;width:100%" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr style="height:15px"><td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 1px solid;width:9%;vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Exhibit&#160;No.</strong></p></td><td style="width:2%;"><p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;">&#160;</p></td><td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 1px solid;vertical-align:top;"><p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>Description</strong></p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px;background-color:#cceeff"><td style="vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><a href="linde_ex991.htm">99.1</a></p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td style="vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><a href="linde_ex991.htm">Press Release dated February 6, 2024</a></p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px;background-color:#ffffff"><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px;background-color:#cceeff"><td style="vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">104</p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td style="vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document)</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><table style="border-spacing:0;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr style="height:15px"><td class="hpbhr">&#160;</td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid; TEXT-INDENT: 0px;"><p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;">2</p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td><p style="page-break-after: always"></p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td>&#160;</td></tr></tbody></table><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;">&#160;</p><p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>SIGNATURES</strong></p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized.</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><table style="border-spacing:0;font-size:10pt;width:100%" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr style="height:15px"><td/><td colspan="3" style="vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>LINDE PLC</strong></p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td style="width:50%;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td style="width:5%;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td colspan="2" style="width:35%;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td style="width:10%;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td style="vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">By:</p></td><td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 1px solid;vertical-align:bottom;" colspan="2"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">/s/ Kelcey E. Hoyt</p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td style="vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Name:</p></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Kelcey E. Hoyt</p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td><td style="vertical-align:top;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Title:</p></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:bottom;"><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Principal Accounting Officer</p></td><td><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Date: February 6, 2024</p><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p><table style="border-spacing:0;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr style="height:15px"><td class="hpbhr">&#160;</td></tr><tr style="height:15px"><td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid; TEXT-INDENT: 0px;"><p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;">3</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#160;</p></body></html>

MARGIN: 0px; text-align:right;"><strong>EXHIBIT 99.1</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:right;">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font-size:10pt;text-align:left;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="width:50%;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><img src="linde_ex991img2.jpg"></p></td> <td> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:right;"><img src="linde_ex991img3.jpg"></p></td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Linde Reports Full-Year and Fourth-Quarter 2023 Results</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Full-Year Highlights</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;text-align:left;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="width:4%;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="width:4%;vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Sales $32.9 billion, down 2%, underlying sales up 5%</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Operating profit $8.0 billion; adjusted operating profit $9.1 billion, up 15%</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Operating profit margin 24.4%; adjusted operating profit margin 27.6%, up 390 basis points versus prior year</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">EPS $12.59; adjusted EPS $14.20, up 16%</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Returned $6.4 billion to shareholders through dividends and share repurchases</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Total project backlog of $8.5 billion</p></td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp; </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Fourth-Quarter Highlights</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;text-align:left;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="width:4%;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="width:4%;vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Sales $8.3 billion, up 5% YoY, underlying sales up 4%</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Operating profit $2.0 billion, adjusted operating profit $2.3 billion, up 14%</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Operating profit margin 24.4%; adjusted operating profit margin 27.4%, YoY up 210 basis points</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">EPS $3.16, up 18%; adjusted EPS $3.59, up 14%</p></td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp; </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>2024 Guidance</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;text-align:left;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="width:4%;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="width:4%;vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">First-quarter 2024 adjusted EPS guidance $3.58 - $3.68, represents 6%-9% growth ex. FX</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&#10146;</p></td> <td style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Full-year 2024 adjusted EPS guidance $15.25 - $15.65, represents 8%-11% growth ex. FX</p></td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp; </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Woking, UK, February 6, 2024 &#8211; Linde plc (Nasdaq: LIN) today reported fourth-quarter 2023 net income of $1,543 million and diluted earnings per share of $3.16, up 16% and 18% respectively.&nbsp; Excluding Linde AG purchase accounting impacts and other charges, adjusted net income was $1,753 million, up 11% versus prior year.&nbsp; Adjusted earnings per share was $3.59, 14% above prior year.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Linde&#8217;s sales for the fourth quarter were $8,302 million, 5% above prior year or 3% above when excluding positive currency impact.&nbsp; Compared to prior year, underlying sales increased 4% from price attainment and flat volumes.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Fourth-quarter operating profit was $2,028 million.&nbsp; Adjusted operating profit of $2,272 million was up 14% versus prior year led by higher price and continued productivity initiatives across all segments.&nbsp; Adjusted operating profit margin of 27.4% was 210 basis points above prior year or 130 basis points higher when excluding the effects of cost pass-through.&nbsp; </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Fourth-quarter operating cash flow of $2,727 million increased 30% versus prior year driven primarily by higher earnings and better working capital. &nbsp;After capital expenditures of $1,151 million, free cash flow was $1,576 million.&nbsp; During the quarter, the company returned $1,641 million to shareholders through dividends and stock repurchases, net of issuances.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">For full-year 2023, sales were $32.9 billion, 2% below 2022.&nbsp; Compared to prior year, underlying sales increased 5% from 6% price attainment partially offset by 1% lower volumes.&nbsp; &nbsp;Operating profit was $8.0 billion and adjusted operating profit was $9.1 billion, 15% above prior year. &nbsp;Adjusted operating profit margin was 27.6% of sales, 390 basis points higher versus 2022, or 310 basis points higher when excluding the effects of cost pass-through.&nbsp; Diluted earnings per share were $12.59 and adjusted diluted earnings per share were $14.20, up 16% versus prior year.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td class="hpbhr">&nbsp;</td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid; TEXT-INDENT: 0px;text-align:center;">Page 14 of 1 </td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td><p style='page-break-after: always'></p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td>&nbsp;</td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp; </p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font-size:10pt;text-align:left;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="width:50%;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><img src="linde_ex991img2.jpg"></p></td> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;text-align:right;margin:0px"><img src="linde_ex991img3.jpg"></p></td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">In 2023, Linde generated strong operating cash flow of $9.3 billion.&nbsp; The company invested $3.8 billion in capital expenditures and returned $6.4 billion to shareholders in the form of dividends and share buybacks.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Commenting on the financial results and business outlook, Chief Executive Officer Sanjiv Lamba said, &#8220;Despite the challenging environment in 2023, the Linde team once again delivered industry leading results including a 25.4% ROC, 27.6% operating margin and EPS growth rate of 16%.&nbsp; In addition, we closed the year with a strong balance sheet and a high-quality project backlog of $8.5 billion which will contribute earnings growth for years to come.&#8221;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Lamba continued, &#8220;Looking ahead, the geopolitical and macro environment remain uncertain.&nbsp; However, we are well positioned to win more than our fair share of high-quality projects and again create shareholder value by leveraging all of the opportunities that lie ahead.&#8221;&nbsp; </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">For the full year 2024, the company expects adjusted diluted earnings per share to be in the range of $15.25 to $15.65, up 7% to 10% versus prior year or 8% to 11% when excluding estimated currency headwinds. &nbsp;Full-year capital expenditures are expected to range between $4.5 billion and $5.0 billion to support operating and growth requirements, including the contractual sale of gas backlog. &nbsp;For the first quarter 2024, adjusted earnings per share is expected to be in the range of $3.58 to $3.68, 5% to 8% above prior-year quarter.&nbsp; This range assumes 1% unfavorable currency.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Fourth-Quarter 2023 Results by Segment</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Americas sales of $3,583 million grew 5% versus prior-year quarter. &nbsp;Compared with fourth quarter 2022, underlying sales increased 6% driven by 5% higher pricing and 1% volumes.&nbsp; Operating profit of $1,075 million was 30.0% of sales, 240 basis points above prior year and 100 basis points higher when excluding the effects of cost pass-through.&nbsp; </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">APAC (Asia Pacific) sales of $1,639 million were 5% above prior year.&nbsp; Compared to prior year, underlying sales grew 5% driven by 2% price attainment and 3% volume growth, primarily in the chemicals and energy end markets including project start-ups.&nbsp; Operating profit of $452 million was 27.6% of sales, 110 basis points above prior year. &nbsp;Year over year cost pass-through was immaterial.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">EMEA (Europe, Middle East &amp; Africa) sales of $2,100 million were up 4% versus prior year.&nbsp; Compared with fourth-quarter 2022, underlying sales grew 2%, driven by 6% higher pricing partially offset by 4% lower volumes. &nbsp;Operating profit of $615 million was 29.3% of sales, 420 basis points above prior year and 350 basis points higher when excluding the effects of cost pass-through.&nbsp; </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Linde Engineering sales were $658 million, 17% above prior year, and operating profit was $119 million or 18.1% of sales.&nbsp; Order intake for the quarter was $567 million and third-party sale of equipment backlog was $3.6 billion. </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Earnings Call</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">A teleconference on Linde&#8217;s fourth-quarter 2023 results is being held today at 9:00 am EST.&nbsp; </p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font-size:10pt;border-right:#000000 1px solid;border-bottom:#000000 1px solid;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 1px solid;width:24%;vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Live conference call</strong></p></td> <td style="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 1px solid;vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">US Toll-Free Dial-In Number: 1 888 770 7292</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">UK Toll-Free Dial-In Number: 0800 358 0970</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Access code: 6877110</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 1px solid;vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Live webcast (listen-only)</strong></p></td> <td style="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 1px solid;vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">https://investors.linde.com/events-presentations</p></td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td class="hpbhr">&nbsp;</td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid; TEXT-INDENT: 0px;text-align:center;">Page 14 of 2 </td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td><p style='page-break-after: always'></p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td>&nbsp;</td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp; </p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font-size:10pt;text-align:left;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="width:50%;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><img src="linde_ex991img2.jpg"></p></td> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;text-align:right;margin:0px"><img src="linde_ex991img3.jpg"></p></td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Materials to be used in the teleconference are also available on the website.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>About Linde</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Linde is a leading global industrial gases and engineering company with 2023 sales of $33 billion. We live our mission of making our world more productive every day by providing high-quality solutions, technologies and services which are making our customers more successful and helping to sustain, decarbonize and protect our planet.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">The company serves a variety of end markets such as chemicals &amp; energy, food &amp; beverage, electronics, healthcare, manufacturing, metals and mining. Linde's industrial gases and technologies are used in countless applications including production of clean hydrogen and carbon capture systems critical to the energy transition, life-saving medical oxygen and high-purity &amp; specialty gases for electronics. Linde also delivers state-of-the-art gas processing solutions to support customer expansion, efficiency improvements and emissions reductions.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">For more information about the company and its products and services, please visit www.linde.com</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Adjusted amounts, free cash flow and return on capital are non-GAAP measures. See the attachments for a summary of non-GAAP reconciliations and calculations for adjusted amounts.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Attachments: Summary Non-GAAP Reconciliations, Statements of Income, Balance Sheets, Statements of Cash Flows, Segment Information and Appendix: Non-GAAP Measures and Reconciliations.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">*Note: We are providing adjusted earnings per share (&#8220;EPS&#8221;) guidance for 2024. This is a non-GAAP financial measure that represents diluted earnings per share from continuing operations (a GAAP measure) but excludes the impact of certain items that we believe are not representative of our underlying business performance, such as cost reduction and other charges, the impact of potential divestitures or other potentially significant items. Given the uncertainty of timing and magnitude of such items, we cannot provide a reconciliation of the differences between the non-GAAP adjusted EPS guidance and the corresponding GAAP EPS measure without unreasonable effort.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><strong>Forward-looking Statements</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">This document contains &#8220;forward-looking statements&#8221; within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. These forward-looking statements are identified by terms and phrases such as: anticipate, believe, intend, estimate, expect, continue, should, could, may, plan, project, predict, will, potential, forecast, and similar expressions. They are based on management&#8217;s reasonable expectations and assumptions as of the date the statements are made but involve risks and uncertainties. These risks and uncertainties include, without limitation: the performance of stock markets generally; developments in worldwide and national economies and other international events and circumstances, including trade conflicts and tariffs; changes in foreign currencies and in interest rates; the cost and availability of electric power, natural gas and other raw materials; the ability to achieve price increases to offset cost increases; catastrophic events including natural disasters, epidemics, pandemics such as COVID-19, and acts of war and terrorism; the ability to attract, hire, and retain qualified personnel; the impact of changes in financial accounting standards; the impact of changes in pension plan liabilities; the impact of tax, environmental, healthcare and other legislation and government regulation in jurisdictions in which the company operates; the cost and outcomes of investigations, litigation and regulatory proceedings; the impact of potential unusual or non-recurring items; continued timely development and market acceptance of new products and applications; the impact of competitive products and pricing; future financial and operating performance of major customers and industries served; the impact of information technology system failures, network disruptions and breaches in data security; and the effectiveness and speed of integrating new acquisitions into the business. These risks and uncertainties may cause future results or circumstances to differ materially from adjusted projections, estimates or other forward-looking statements.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">Linde plc assumes no obligation to update or provide revisions to any forward-looking statement in response to changing circumstances. The above listed risks and uncertainties are further described in Item 1A. Risk Factors in Linde plc&#8217;s Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2022 filed with the SEC on February 28, 2023, which should be reviewed carefully. Please consider Linde plc&#8217;s forward-looking statements in light of those risks.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td class="hpbhr">&nbsp;</td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid; TEXT-INDENT: 0px;text-align:center;">Page 14 of 3 </td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td><p style='page-break-after: always'></p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td>&nbsp;</td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>LINDE PLC AND SUBSIDIARIES</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>SUMMARY NON-GAAP RECONCILIATIONS</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>(UNAUDITED)</strong></p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">The following adjusted amounts are Non-GAAP measures and are intended to supplement investors' understanding of the company's financial statements by providing measures which investors, financial analysts and management use to help evaluate the company's operating performance. Items which the company does not believe to be indicative of ongoing business trends are excluded from these calculations so that investors can better evaluate and analyze historical and future business trends on a consistent basis. Definitions of these Non-GAAP measures may not be comparable to similar definitions used by other companies and are not a substitute for similar GAAP measures. See the "NON GAAP MEASURES AND RECONCILIATIONS" starting on page 9 for additional details relating to the adjustments.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> text-align:center;"><strong>LINDE PLC AND SUBSIDIARIES</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>APPENDIX</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>NON-GAAP MEASURES AND RECONCILIATIONS</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>(UNAUDITED)</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">The following Non-GAAP measures are intended to supplement investors&#8217; understanding of the company&#8217;s financial information by providing measures which investors, financial analysts and management use to help evaluate the company&#8217;s operating performance and liquidity.&nbsp; Items which the company does not believe to be indicative of on-going business trends are excluded from these calculations so that investors can better evaluate and analyze historical and future business trends on a consistent basis.&nbsp; Definitions of these Non-GAAP measures may not be comparable to similar definitions used by other companies and are not a substitute for similar GAAP measures. </p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;text-align:left;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> solid;white-space: nowrap;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td class="ffcell" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 1px solid;vertical-align:bottom;text-align:right;">32.5</td> <td style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 1px;vertical-align:bottom;white-space: nowrap;">%</td> <td style="white-space: nowrap;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 1px solid;white-space: nowrap;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td class="ffcell" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 1px solid;vertical-align:bottom;text-align:right;">32.4</td> <td style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 1px;vertical-align:bottom;white-space: nowrap;">%</td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">(a) The income tax expense (benefit) on the non-GAAP pre-tax adjustments was determined using the applicable tax rates for the jurisdictions that were utilized in calculating the GAAP income tax expense (benefit) and included both current and deferred income tax amounts.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">(b) Net of income taxes which are shown separately in &#8220;Adjusted Income Taxes and Effective Tax Rate&#8221;.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">(c) The company believes that its non-GAAP measures excluding Purchase accounting impacts - Linde AG are useful to investors because:</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td class="hpbhr">&nbsp;</td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid; TEXT-INDENT: 0px;text-align:center;">Page 14 of 11 </td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td><p style='page-break-after: always'></p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td>&nbsp;</td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">(i) the 2018 business combination was a merger of equals in an all-stock merger transaction, with no cash consideration,</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">(ii) the company is managed on a geographic basis and the results of certain geographies are more heavily impacted by purchase accounting than others, causing results that are not comparable at the reportable segment level, therefore, the impacts of purchasing accounting adjustments to each segment vary and are not comparable within the company and when compared to other companies in similar regions, (iii) business management is evaluated and variable compensation is determined based on results excluding purchase accounting impacts, and;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">(iv) it is important to investors and analysts to understand the purchase accounting impacts to the financial statements.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">A summary of each of the adjustments made for Purchase accounting impacts - Linde AG are as follows:</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><em>Adjusted Operating Profit and Margin:</em> The purchase accounting adjustments for the periods presented relate primarily to depreciation and amortization related to the fair value step up of fixed assets and intangible assets (primarily customer related) acquired in the merger and the allocation of fair value step-up for ongoing Linde AG asset disposals (reflected in Other Income/(Expense)).</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><em>Adjusted Interest Expense - Net</em>: Relates to the amortization of the fair value of debt acquired in the merger.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><em>Adjusted Income Taxes and Effective Tax Rate:</em> Relates to the current and deferred income tax impact on the adjustments discussed above. The income tax expense (benefit) on the non-GAAP pre-tax adjustments was determined using the applicable tax rates for the jurisdictions that were utilized in calculating the GAAP income tax expense (benefit) and included both current and deferred income tax amounts.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><em>Adjusted Income from Equity Investments:</em> Represents the amortization of increased fair value on equity investments related to depreciable and amortizable assets.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px"><em>Adjusted Noncontrolling Interests:</em> Represents the noncontrolling interests&#8217; ownership portion of the adjustments described above determined on an entity by entity basis.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">(d) We are providing adjusted earnings per share (&#8220;EPS&#8221;) guidance for 2024. This is a non-GAAP financial measure that represents diluted earnings per share (a GAAP measure) but excludes the impact of certain items that we believe are not representative of our underlying business performance, such as cost reduction and other charges and the impact of potential divestitures or other potentially significant items. Given the uncertainty of timing and magnitude of such items, we cannot provide a reconciliation of the differences between the non-GAAP adjusted EPS guidance and the corresponding GAAP EPS measure without unreasonable effort.</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <table style="border-spacing:0;font:10pt times new roman;width:100%" cellpadding="0"> <tr style="height:15px"> <td class="hpbhr">&nbsp;</td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid; TEXT-INDENT: 0px;text-align:center;">Page 14 of 12 </td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td><p style='page-break-after: always'></p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px"> <td>&nbsp;</td></tr></table> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>LINDE PLC AND SUBSIDIARIES</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>APPENDIX</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>NON-GAAP MEASURES AND RECONCILIATIONS</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; MARGIN: 0px; text-align:center;"><strong>(UNAUDITED)</strong></p> <p style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 0in"><strong>Free Cash Flow (FCF)</strong> - Free cash flow is a measure used by investors, financial analysts and management to evaluate the ability of a company to pursue opportunities that enhance shareholder value. FCF equals cash flow from operations less capital expenditures.</p></td> <td style="white-space: nowrap;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td></tr> <tr style="vertical-align:top;"> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px 0px 0px 0in"><u><strong>After-tax Return on Capital and Adjusted After-tax Return on Capital (ROC)</strong> -</u> After-tax return on capital is a measure used by investors, financial analysts and management to evaluate the return on net assets employed in the business. ROC measures the after-tax operating profit that the company was able to generate with the investments made by all parties in the business (debt, noncontrolling interests and Linde plc shareholders&#8217; equity).</p></td></tr> <tr style="height:15px;background-color:#ffffff"> <td> <p style="font-size:10pt;font-family:times new roman;margin:0px">&nbsp;</p></td> <td <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="authRefData" style="display: none;" id="defref_dei_SolicitingMaterial">
<tr><td class="hide"><a style="color: white;" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="Show.hideAR();">X</a></td></tr>
<tr><td><div class="body" style="padding: 2px;">
<a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="Show.toggleNext( this );">- Definition</a><div><p>Boolean flag that is true when the Form 8-K filing is intended to satisfy the filing obligation of the registrant as soliciting material pursuant to Rule 14a-12 under the Exchange Act.</p></div>

<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */

	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */

	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

	display: none;
}

	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

	width: 10em;
}

	font-style: italic;
}

	font-size: 1em;
}
